name: Stickman Run 'n Gun
description:
From the creators of Gun Fu: Stickman Edition comes the next Stickman hit!

Get the same Stickman-shooting action you know and love while hurdling through a dangerous warzone! Make use of handy powerups and boosts and climb the leaderboards for world supremacy!

FEATURES

+ Stylised stickman-slaying action
+ The fun of an endless runner with the added emphasis on shooting
+ Boosts and powerups to help you dominate
+ Customize your Stickman with over a dozen costumes, and more on the way
+ Game Center supported leaderboards and achievements

Over a million Gun Fu: Stickman Edition players can't be wrong - we know our Stickman games! Grab Stickman Run 'n Gun today!
